name: Crossword Cryptogram Solver
description:
Solve crosswords puzzles, cryptograms, hangman games, or Wheel of Fortune type puzzles easily.
Want to check how long it would take to solve your favorite quotes? Type them in, convert to UPPERCASE, and it solve.
(Names are not part of the dictionary--all possible would slow down solves--so remove authors names before solving online cryptograms.)
What to solve for letters in a crossword. Try cr#sswXrd cryptXgram. The X would stand for a letter common to both. The # an unknown. Lower case letters are recognized as being correct.

Cryptograms can have up to 30 unique words.
